# octopusdeploy_project (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "octopusdeploy_project" "petclinic" {
  project_name = "PetClinic"
}

data "octopusdeploy_project" "octopus_deploy" {
  project_id = "Projects-1241"
}
```
